record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="upgenclapplication" and term="Upgenclapplication table" and format.name="upgenclapplication" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: upgenclapplication
record.format.name: upgenclapplication

brief.brief: Records dependencies between applications and tables for the upgrade process.
If the upgrade process cannot install some items, it cites either a table or another application in the detail run report as the cause.

The sub-applications and tables listed for the application have upgrade script records indicating that one or more of the sub-applications or tables the upgrade could not install them in the current system.

detail.detail: P4 Utility: a subroutine created by company and used in one or more of its standard applications.
Command Panel: an application (written in C) that is a command in the Service Manager language.
Output Conversion: an output conversion routine used on forms.
Input Conversion: an input conversion routine used on forms.
Uddt: a user defined data type application used in the Database Dictionary utility to create a new data type.
Report: a report application, created with and used by Report Writer.
P4 appl: an application created by company.
